organizations.name: London School of Economics
quotes: With a master’s degree from the London School of Economics, he combines policy expertise with a strong vision for digital transformation and innovation.

roles.title: Member of Parliament
quotes: Nikolai Astrup is a prominent Norwegian politician from the Conservative Party, known for his leadership in digitalization and sustainable development.
A long-time Member of Parliament for Oslo, Astrup has led key committees on energy, transport, and finance.

roles.title: Minister of Digitalization
quotes: As Norway’s first Minister of Digitalization, he played a key role in shaping the country’s digital future.

roles.title: Minister of Local Government and Modernization
quotes: He has also served as Minister of Local Government and Modernization and Minister of International Development.

roles.title: Minister of International Development
quotes: He has also served as Minister of Local Government and Modernization and Minister of International Development.
A long-time Member of Parliament for Oslo, Astrup has led key committees on energy, transport, and finance.
